greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of the solution to (1 + x)*x^(1 - x) = x^x.
mathematica: RealDigits[x /. FindRoot[(1 + x)*x^(1 - x) == x^x, {x, 1/2}, WorkingPrecision -> 100]][[1]] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Apr 29 2018 *)
program: (PARI) solve(x=1/3, 1, (1 + x)*x^(1 - x) - x^x) \\ _Michel Marcus_, Apr 18 2018
results.author: _Juri-Stepan Gerasimov_, Apr 17 2018
